title: Vanya Kundan and Emerald Haar: A Symphony of Tradition and Modern Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (Swarna) with intricate Kundan settings. Features a central pear-shaped Zambian Emerald (Panna) of exceptional color and clarity
complemented by smaller round Emeralds. High-quality cubic zirconia stones for added brilliance. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This contemporary Haaram reimagines classic Kundan craftsmanship. The floral motifs are meticulously handcrafted with embedded Kundan stones. The pendant showcases a prominent pear-shaped Zambian Emerald, beautifully framed by smaller emeralds and CZs. The floral elements provide an aesthetically pleasing chain formation.
colors: Primarily gold and brilliant white (from the Kundan and CZ stones)
occasions: Perfect for modern celebrations and special occasions. Its lighter weight and contemporary design make it suitable for engagements
or any festive gathering. A graceful choice even for a modern bride who appreciates traditional craftsmanship.
description: This Kundan Haar offers the timeless beauty of traditional Kundan jewelry with a modern, wearable design. The use of genuine Zambian Emeralds elevates its value and aesthetic appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting, rich luster. A piece that seamlessly blends cultural heritage with contemporary style.
